title: Succubus Shougakusei Extra
description:
These are the extra chapter for Succubus Shougakusei (https://mangadex.org/title/49761/grade-school-student-succubus).
The extra chapters are all fully colored and contain uncensored sex scenes, hence the need to be set apart from the main story.

Supporters on Fanbox and SubscribeStar have early access to all published content on the following sites: 
Author's Fanbox: https://www.fanbox.cc/@ryuugamineryuuto
Author's Subscribestar: https://subscribestar.adult/ryuugamine-ryuuto

You can also follow the author on these links for updates on progress and other illustrations:
Author's Pixiv: https://www.pixiv.net/users/32558948
Author's Twitter: https://twitter.com/YamiryuuZero
